website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality dog kennel is equipped to handle extreme weather while still providing your pet with a comfortable space.
pros: Remarkable construction offers insulation in both hot and cold weather conditions
Raised floor allows ground to stay dry
Design allows for superior roof ventilation
cons: Exceedingly expensive when compared with other models

customer_reviews.title: Is this thing used???
customer_reviews.text: Dog house arrived on time but covered in stickers and completely filthy. You can see in the photos how dirty it is. No way this thing is new.
customer_reviews.author: novella99

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm in winter
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the medium house for our two outdoor dogs-a Yorkie and a dachshund. It's a good fit for them. We also purchased a heating unit for the house so that they could stay warm through the harsh Montana winters. Now at the beginning of January, they are staying toasty warm even in -8 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Short

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pet house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pet house, I use this size for my outdoor cats, they love it and this product holds up. I have purchased 5 of these units, and all are just like new. Even with 100 degree heat in the summer down to winter time temps in the minus - this product holds up and does not discolor, warp or deteriorate. I buy this house over the cat house as it does not have the deep entryway, and in both hot and cold weather that added depth keeps the wind, rain and snow out.
customer_reviews.author: shoppergal

customer_reviews.title: Nick, Rescue Pit Loves his igloo..
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it..And what's of more importance is Nick Likes it..He is only outside alittle in the mornings are alittle in the evenings, but everytime I open the back door to let him back in he comes out of his igloo..he is 80 lbs and the large is perfect for him..My boys happy I'm happy..TLC
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: safe haven
customer_reviews.text: my mostly feral cat learned to come inside to be close to another cat in my home. they were best friends, mutual grooming etc. When this cat died, the feral returned to the outdoors, refusing to come inside. This has kept her warm and dry. Very glad to have found it
customer_reviews.author: Jan Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: I wish this was a little bit bigger. Rain ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was a little bit bigger. Rain does get into it at the front entrance. I will have to rig something up to keep the rain out.
customer_reviews.author: raclib

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.  What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog immediately chewed up the swinging door and plastic around the entrance the first time we left him outside for more than an hour with it, but he would have done that with any dog house since he's still growing out of his puppy stage. He seems to like it okay. We fill it with straw for extra insulation in the winter (because he would chew up a blanket). It's easy to clean and is a good size for a 75 pound Labrador. I think it's a little pricey for this type of product, but buying it from this seller was much cheaper than getting it from PetSmart of Petco.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Collins

customer_reviews.title: Large does
customer_reviews.text: FYI the large size says for up to 90lbs but that’s not entirely accurate. I have a 72lb German Shepherd and it was much too small for him. If you have a golden retriever, lab, German Shepherd, anything of that size you are going to need the xl.
customer_reviews.author: LindzNC

customer_reviews.title: Great cat shelter!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I expected. I care for a large colony of stray and feral cats. I've been working with a wonderful group to get them TNR'd. I have transformed my 2 car garage into a kitty hotel. I normally make shelters from the large styrofoam coolers, but I have a dad, mom and 2 youngsters who like to cuddle up together. This is the perfect size. I lined it with 2 of the MILLIARD Thermal Cat Mats and stuffed it with straw. This arrived very well packaged and in excellent condition. The box was so huge though, I could be shipped along with a couple of friends inside it.
customer_reviews.author: giabella

customer_reviews.title: Miss Abigail Loves It.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this April 2017, for my 14 year old Welsh Corgi, Abigail. She was a bit reluctant to use it at first, but that changed as soon as we had a thunderstorm. Now she sleeps in it every night. I was able to set it up so that she can lay in her house and watch the back door. I am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Royden

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dog house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog house. I bought it for my son who lives in Reno, Nevada. The dogs have to sleep outside and this house seems to afford the most protection with it's slightly angled tunnel opening. I also bought a flap door to help keep out the wind (an extra) and a heated pad to go under their bed. My son is very pleased with it and the dogs are happy to go on it where they snuggle up together.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret V. Magill

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: Item was broken badly when it arrived and I refused delivery. the driver state he had never seen a product damaged that badly. all of the mounting brackets for the floor of the unit were broken except 1 and it was cracked. very disappointed in the item after waiting so long for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D.

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later: Dog says No
customer_reviews.text: After six months of trying to get our dog to use this house (in which we never received the promised "Free Door"), we still have yet to get him to voluntarily go in. We thought it may be skunks, but detected no smell--and that would eventually wear off. The only thing I can figure is the distinctive odor from the plastics. Even our cats wont go in. I see another buyer had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: douglasg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but dog wouldn't sleep in it
customer_reviews.text: Doghouse seems to be really good quality and well made. Sturdy enough to handle a full grown man standing on it without warping. I docked a star because call me cheap but the price is pretty hefty (200$ when I purchased it) when you think is is just a hunk of plastic but I digress. Would have been great but after weeks of trying to get our dog to sleep in it we just ended up selling it. Take that as you will.
customer_reviews.author: LankyFrenchman

customer_reviews.title: Filty and scratched TFU!! Black scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy to many irregularities, for the$$$.it stated New, on Amazon.but aslong as it took:-\ not sure where it came from.Said delivery betwix 3-7pm..dropped at front door without signature..Said to me on phone call,that signature is required or I'd have to reschedule!! Left my client at home alone, to be home by 3 to 7. got home somewhere around 1:30 and it was sitting at the front door..Sheer Madness.
customer_reviews.author: Doll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home for your fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: In love!!!!!! bought this for my pup and she absolutely loves it! It was completely put together when delivered so the box was pretty big when delivered to my door .... I wish I still had a picture of the box because it look like it had been dropped from the sky, but it really didn't matter because the igloo was completely intact and not damaged. But I've had it for almost a year now and my dog couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: ChampagneVillanelle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our upstate NY weather. Our dog is only occasionally left outdoors in his large 10x 10 kennel, this will give him a place to relax. I have to do some training, he did not go in on his own yet.
customer_reviews.author: janonthemtn

customer_reviews.title: great product USA made but small opening
customer_reviews.text: Great product if your dog is super small in the leg department, I ordered the large 50-90lb version as my Vizsla is only 40 lbs and he cant get through the opening let alone curl up in this little interior space more so if you put a pad and a blanket in it for comfort. Built extremely well and in the USA which is the reason I also purchased it but its a bust for any dog that has longer legs
customer_reviews.author: Jdawg

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn’t have to assemble this because the person who sold it to me did it for me! By the way, thank you very much!! I’m pleased with this item & this is great for my dog. I have a pitbull that’s a little over 50 lbs. This is perfect for her size. Plenty of room. Keeps her dry on rainy days & provides shade from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: If only the dog liked it as much as my toddler did.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was very nice. It seems well made, and I like that it can be taken apart to be cleaned. I personally loved this house for our small hound mix (she's about 27 pounds.) My 2 year old toddler also loft the house. Unfortunately, the dog didn't feel the same way. She refused to go in, and we are now trying to sell it since we are past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Dog Igloos fell short on care and shipping
customer_reviews.text: The two "large" dog igloos came unboxed and unwrapped by delivery truck, loose on top of furniture. The tops were already snapped onto bases. $326.98 Both are marked up with several black slashes on exterior surface that we have been unable to remove. One of the molded fasteners was snapped off of top, clinking around inside. At least the four interior pads fit. $196.16 I would not buy the Igloos again except from a local pet store where quality can be inspected. We will need "extra large" in six months for our Mastadors!
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom seemed to be sprung upon arrival. They just didn't snap or lock together as I thought they would. I compensated by using duct tape in an attempt to cover the areas where water could seep in. I added 2 beds in there with blankets and pillows. The cats are using it, so I am sure its dry. Nothing will go into a cold wet bed environment. So I think I'm ok for now. Wish this dog house was half the size tho. I got the medium which is the smallest one I could find which was still huge. It just wasn't cost effective to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Size not true to advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star only due to the mismatch between the size advertisement and reality. I purchased L size. My puppy is about 3 months old and already weighs about 40lbs. Description says that it should be good for a dog up to 90lbs. Not quite. At 40lbs, my puppy could fit snuggly into the house, but I can see it already being too small a month from now. Not for large dogs definitely.
customer_reviews.author: YSR

customer_reviews.title: Good doghouse for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Good doghouse for my dog. He can get away from the door& curl up in the back. I bought a large with the swinging in-out door. My dog is a 25-30 lb dog. Good size for him. He can stretch out if he wants. I recommend an extra large size for a larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect in there and keeps him cozy
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves it... he's an 85 lb shepherd. fits perfect in there and keeps him cozy. well built and stays clean
customer_reviews.author: lauren M

customer_reviews.title: Good dog house, but arrived dirty and scuffed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog house. Like many other reviewers stated, the dog house arrived dirty and very scruffed up. It is heavy and bulky or I would have tried to exchange it. That being said, it certainly does not look like it arrived in new condition. Still the best price for comparable items that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: The item was smaller than I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was smaller than I thought it would be but it seems to be ok for our size dog. we have a juvenile (6 months old) blue tick coon hound. I hope she does not out grow this dog house. I got the house with a pad that fits perfectly inside. I did not buy the flap for the front door. The dog has tried to chew the entrance but has not been an issue yet. some rain does get into the door area but does not get into the sleeping area.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ozzie lives here
customer_reviews.text: We have a large lab cross puppy, 5 months old. He loves this house, especially during thunderstorms. He likes to drape himself over the top of it. Weatherproof and cozy
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: It works and will do the job its intended for. It came oddly packaged and it was obviously used or banged around too much. Like i said it will do the basic job of keeping the pup out of the rain and relatively warm. Just wasnt happy about the way it came or the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Seriously???!
customer_reviews.text: I know that I did not pay almost 150 for a used igloo dog house and a horrible box delivery 📦
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is incorrect, just as others have clearly reviewed. Unfortunately, I ignored them and hoped a size large would fit my 80 lb male golden retriever. Not even close. If you are at all on the fence about sizing, size up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cinandra McCleery

customer_reviews.title: Not for chewers!!
customer_reviews.text: This photo shows 3 mo of "wear & tear" with bitter apple applied! I'm afraid that rain will start running in soon. For comparison, my old dogloos have tooth marks, but no major changes in length!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: emergency outdoor shelter for 2 cats
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a shelter for my moms two cats who are indoor/outdoor pets, mom is elderly and sometimes they get left out overnight, this is exactly what we needed, put a pad inside and a kitchen carpet in the entrance so now they have a way out of the cold if they get left out at night..
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: THE ENTRANCE WAY IS TOO SMALL FOR A BIG DOG.
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised that this big dog house has such a small door. My dog's height is almost up to my hip bone. He is an old dog that can not kneel down low enough to enter. But why in the world should he have to? This is the largest dog house the company makes.
customer_reviews.author: Denyce

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not great for a Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of the XL for our dogs. We are not able to use both of them because there is no way our Great Dane will fit into it. Our other dog will fit just fine because he is a mutt who is closer to a lab size and will have no problem getting inside. It looks like a great product, just wish they made an XXL for the giant breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!  Buy at least 1 size larger!
customer_reviews.text: This doghouse runs WAAYYY small! My dogs are well within the weight recommendations for their houses, but cannot use them!
customer_reviews.author: Janine A. Garfinkel

customer_reviews.title: Received refurbished dog house, not new.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for a NEW dog house, and received a refurbished one. About 2-3 large, red stickers were on the item. Price should have reflected that. Didn’t return, as it was too big to send back. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: G Ingino

customer_reviews.title: Problem with latch
customer_reviews.text: One side doesn’t stay hooked. 65lb dog comfy. Says good to 90lbs, my 75lb dog is a bit snug
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: great for 6 feral cats
customer_reviews.text: purchased for 6 feral cats that i have been taking care of. With all of the snow and cold winter in Ohio, this is perfect for them. I did put a tarp over the top of it because it seems to help with the cold plastic and also it seemed to get a little wet on the inside, but don't know if that was from the cats' fur and wet paws. The cats are all full grown and quite large. Not too sure how they all fit in there, but they do!!!
customer_reviews.author: lauraferrero

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I have two of the larger igloo dog houses, but needed another one for our newest addition. I have two heelers and a beagle. At first I thought it was going to be too small for my blue heeler, but it turns out that he prefers this house over the larger ones. He is on the small side for a heeler though, as the other one couldn't fit in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Riley75

customer_reviews.title: Great for comfort, summer or winter, for our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Extra large was much smaller than the ones I had 20 years ago, but it will do. The price was way too much, but we love our big furbaby. Is big enough for our sweet German Shepard !
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Lamborghini of the doggie house
customer_reviews.text: 50 pound America bully. Glad I brought it. She needs some outdoor time with good outdoor shelter. This meets all expectations
customer_reviews.author: cassie curtis

customer_reviews.title: Comes assembled ready to use
customer_reviews.text: Comes fully assembled. Good for moderate foul weather. Work best in a covered run. My dogs tried to chew the edges but the plastic held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived already assembled and was broken the latches that connect were broken!! Gave one star because I had to choose a star!
customer_reviews.author: Jimeya Nash Claxton

customer_reviews.title: My dog is on the medium/large side 65 pounds and ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is on the medium/large side 65 pounds and he doesn't fit in the LARGE it is too awkward for him to get inside. should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't care for it and rain got inside pretty easily. Mine ended up in the land fill ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog didn't care for it and rain got inside pretty easily. Mine ended up in the land fill because nobody even wanted it for free. I suppose in some places it would work, but not so much in a super rainy climate.
customer_reviews.author: DrMom

customer_reviews.title: Our Brittany Spaniel went into his house immediately, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Brittany Spaniel went into his house immediately, and likes it. It does need the pad, or perhaps a thick carpet. We purchased the pad, and throw a sheet on it on cold nights.. Draw back...it needs a couple of hand-holds on each side of the back part.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Haley

customer_reviews.title: Put a heated outdoor pad in there and an old flannel sheet and the 3 of them are HAPPY, HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the barn cats which hang out on our deck at night. Put a heated outdoor pad in there and an old flannel sheet and the 3 of them are HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: AnniePanda

customer_reviews.title: Great !!! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great ! Good for hot weather and cold . Dog was nervous At first but now it’s his comfort spot when we have to use outside
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We inherited a neighbor's cat. She loves the house and it keeps here dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: TheWicks

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this house. Great entry design to keep windy days off my dogs. Well made and perfect size for two small dogs or one medium size dog. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out Product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean especially compared to my old stick built dog house. Good bye spiders and mold!
customer_reviews.author: Fastnet

customer_reviews.title: Can you make one for 200lb adult male?
customer_reviews.text: I love this doghouse but unfortunately my dog does not... It is so nice I intend to keep it anyway lol
customer_reviews.author: Alohaherb

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: Good item overall. I give a 4 and not a five because there are things that could be improved - it should come with a mat. it should also have a carry-handle for ease in moving (it's awkward shape). But good size for medium size dog and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BassRacer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great outdoor house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor house, and much cheaper to buy on Amazon. Although it is billed as a dog house,we have a new mother cat with three little kittens that has camped on our land, so we are using this as a winter shelter for our new outdoor family! We were able to build a platform to elevate this so they would be dry and warm and off the ground, and are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: My Dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large for my 95 pound Doberman. The opening is to small for her to stand and walk in she has to crouch and bangs her legs on the sharp plastic opening. It leaks where the bottom attaches to the top. It's an expensive piece of plastic junk with no insulation from the cold. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Igloo
customer_reviews.text: I think it's really cool the igloo look but my dog will not go inside of it I don't know why but he doesn't like it but I'm going to keep it I bought it I'm not going to return it I think it's a good product but my dog is stubborn what can I say!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Rumble and Cooper totally dig it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected...a nice, fairly roomy dog house! Definitely keeps the rain out. We have a medium sized dog and it took him a few minutes to figure out how to enter it, but once he did, he only came out to eat/potty for like 3 DAYS!! I was worried that maybe he thought he was in trouble or something! Guess he just totally digs it!
customer_reviews.author: Carli Bouston

customer_reviews.title: Good dog house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pet. I was a little worried because my dog could have used the large house instead of the medium. Once she made it inside the house she did not want to come out. I put her favorite pillow and blanket
customer_reviews.author: Hilda G Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not sure worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was over a week late and then delivered damaged at the roof vent (which doesn't even look that good of a ventilation system). Contacted seller and waiting on a response.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dog took right to this house the first day. He uses it to stay warm and cool. The raised bottom piece keeps all but heavy runoff out and the extended overhang at the entrance further blocks rain and direct sunlight. My dog is 80# and fits easily. It would comfortably house a dog weighing 120#.
customer_reviews.author: Earley

customer_reviews.title: Produce itself good both me and pop like
customer_reviews.text: arrived damaged. agreed on credit instead of returning. took 2 months to see credt agreed to. Produce itself good both me and pop like it
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bingaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this dog house? It's inexpensive, durable, chew proof, light weight, and the interior space with a narrowed entrance is perfect. A bag of cedar shavings from Walmart lasts a long time as bedding material. I couldn't get the release latches to work but the unit is light enough to empty the used shavings.My young springer took to it immediately and will have room enough as she matures.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara M. Naleid

customer_reviews.title: I like the house but it isn't big enough for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the house but it isn't big enough for my Lab. I have an older house like this one that she sleeps in. I would have returned it but a helpful neighbor put it up while I was not at home. I may adopt another dog someday that will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Minor defect.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic mold pieces do not lock together correctly. I will have to alter it somehow or duct tape it to keep cold air from flowing through. Better than most, even with this defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, yet uninhabitable
customer_reviews.text: Great product, stands up to the mediocre Socal weather. Doesn't get too wet inside and is very durable, can support myself standing on it @ 180lbs. It would be even better if my Shepard would use it, but he instead would rather enjoy soaking up gallons of water in his fur.
customer_reviews.author: Grillon

customer_reviews.title: Our dog did'5 like it
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but our dog didn't like it so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bonjorno

customer_reviews.title: Cat rescue winner!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Crucial for a cat rescue, where some cats are outside and in a barn! Very good quality / great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOTE:  “Clearance” Or “Sale” Merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Clearance Price (Reflected ) Product Damaged Possibly In Transit Plastic Near Bottom Portion Where Top Meets Bottom-Significant Crack Still Wort It Though
customer_reviews.author: Collica, Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Does not go together.
customer_reviews.text: The top and the bottom have to be snapped together. Except, mine did not snap into place. The top and bottom are about half an inch off so that only one side can be snapped together. I waited for 6 weeks for this to be delivered and I am going to have to get another dog house soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, but apparently the opening was too small ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but apparently the opening was too small for our dog. Our dog is only about 30 lbs and 2.5' tall standing on all fours, he wasn't comfortable getting into the dog house. We gave it a month with no improvement then returned it. I'd suggest going for the large if your dog is about the same size as ours.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Pawa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description online
customer_reviews.text: The description is right on and we had no surprises. Unfortunately our dog hasn't voluntarily went in it but we have never left her outside for extended periods of time. Our 3 year old son has spent more time playing in here than the dog.
customer_reviews.author: MissSerenia

customer_reviews.title: Warm House for Feral Cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a very warm house for my feral cats. It's easy to clean and durable. I've had a duplicate for years. It's a good place for the cats to stay out of the rain and wind. I add a heating pad and some old blankets or rugs to cuddle up to.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoys Reading

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and its design keeps him nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: DrChuck

customer_reviews.title: overpriced and not that great of a dog house
customer_reviews.text: shipment wasn’t that great, missing piece on top of house, scratches on top, and doesn’t completely close. somehow my dogs bottom bed was wet and moist, but everything else was dry.
customer_reviews.author: K-Do

customer_reviews.title: The second one arrived in a perfect condition. The dog house seems to be quite ...
customer_reviews.text: This first one arrived defective. The second one arrived in a perfect condition. The dog house seems to be quite robust.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Indigo Dog House with Microban Medium Taupe Top
customer_reviews.text: My stray cats love this House, when it's cold out & they don't want to come inside my house they snuggle up inside this house to keep warm. I also put blankets inside it so they can even be warmer on cool days, there is alot of room inside this house for them so they can go to the back and keep as warm as possible. I would definately recommend this house to anyone looking to help out stray cats or to keep their dogs out of the cold weather!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: nice dog house
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice product. There were a few scuff marks on outside but ......it's a dog house
customer_reviews.author: Deb L.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh depends on your dog
customer_reviews.text: Kinda dark and scary. Maybe I just have a nervous Nelly but my dog did not get in it once! I threw it out
customer_reviews.author: Samira18

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built. Will protect from the elements when needed
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built. Will protect from the elements when needed. I like how the entrance is set out a little from the actual house so that there is extra protection from rain.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition, made well. :)
customer_reviews.text: Love, LOVE, LOVEEEEEEEEEEE IT. Now...if only the intended dog would...life would be great. :P. Never had a dog house. I bought it so my westie (8yr old of spit fire) can get away from our german shepherd puppy (who's now almost 50 lbs. Cant wait for him to realize its an escape route from getting pounced upon by the puppy. :P
customer_reviews.author: Marie Tyler Wiley

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Overall my 122 lbs Rottweiler seems to be very comfortable in his igloo.The only negative is I should have gotten the largest size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R Pompa

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm for my pet
customer_reviews.text: nice and warm for my pet, this size is for small dogs, my dog is a terry mixed with chihuahua
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived already assembled and was broken the latches that connect were broken!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy R

customer_reviews.title: Our Beagle is super happy in this dog house
customer_reviews.text: Our Beagle is super happy in this dog house! We put a big thick pillow that she normally sleeps on in the house to make it feel more like home with a small blanket. She LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Nice doghouse with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality dog house and quick delivery. Wish they could come up with one that the pups didn't like to chew on. Don't know why they think these are so yummy. Maybe they just want to make them their own. Good weather protection, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house.
customer_reviews.text: Our small dog quickly took to this house. It arrived assembled and ready to go. It's light so I'm going to find a way to tie it down but overall this house is functional and I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mason Clark

customer_reviews.title: NIce Dogloo, but too large for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Dogloo for a friendly, feral cat that lives behind my house. The Indigo Dogloo looked to be a quality product. However, it was larger than I needed. I returned it and bought a Dogloo XT medium. The Dogloo XT is the perfect size for a feral cat that needs to see if other animals are approaching the Dogloo... or if dinner is being served by the nice lady in the big house.
customer_reviews.author: No E

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: To small. Said it was for a large dog but definitely not the case. More for a medium size dog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Obviously VERY STURDY! There are shoe prints all over the top of it!
customer_reviews.author: Tattyy

customer_reviews.title: It didn't came with a box and is used
customer_reviews.text: A product that comes with no box and is used dog house is not worth of buy it for 214 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Modesto

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 little dogs love it, we filled it with straw and gave them a cotton blanket to put in it as well and they love it! Keeps the wind off of them, along with the rain, and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Michelle Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is so goofy he didn't think he needed to stay in this house when it was raining. He'd rather sit out in the rain and the mud! However, my feral cats are really enjoying the shelter! Nice product! Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: MA Domenico

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my feral cats to use as a winter shelter, and it seems perfect. Just have to rig something up to make the entrance smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have one already and bought this for a pup that that was abandoned and it was not soon after he was hit by a car, I am going to keep it as I am thinking of getting another pup as people are always dumping their dogs in the country where I live. People really do suck someone should dump them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very sturdy dog house with a floor that clamps into place plus an upper vent. Seems to be weather proof with no leakage. Seems to be well made. Plus the dog uses it and seems satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House
customer_reviews.text: I was very careful to get the right size based on my Vet's recommendation. My 40lb dog loves this doghouse and sleeps in it every night. It will be really good in the winter since he can curl up inside and be blocked from the wind and cold. It is so nice looking that we ended up putting it on our back porch. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norvell

customer_reviews.title: If you love your pet DO Not purchase this dog house from here!
customer_reviews.text: Someone tried to fix this supposedly new dog house only to have a pointed 3" plastic piece that will injure my dog. Plastic was peeling off. ..doggy door holes were damaged....this was the worst purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cat warm on cold nights!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it. Keeps her warm in freezing cold weather. Put a cat bed inside for her.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog house
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog house!!! It is everything they say it is. If I could give it a higher ratting I would. It is light, sturdy, roomie and nicely finished. My dog liked it right away. If you are in the market buy this product. Believe it or not free shipping and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Murty

product_meta.title: INDIGO W/MICROBAN
product_meta.description:
Color:TAUPE/BLACK| Size:Extra-Large

Petmate's Indigo Dog House is a sturdy and spacious shelter designed to provide comfort for pets year-round. The insulated dog house features a heavy-duty construction that keeps pets cool in the summer and warm in the winter. The outdoor dog house's extended, offset doorway helps protect pets inside from wind and rain. To promote air flow, the vented top of the dog igloo circulates fresh air inside. The raised floors are equipped with side moats that are designed to drain off moisture and keep floors dry. Microban Antimicrobial Product Protection helps prevent the growth of stain and odor-causing bacteria. A wide range of pets can enjoy the outdoor pet house, available in medium, large, and extra large sizes to accommodate pets weighing 90 to 125 pounds. For added comfort, pet parents can customize the Indigo Dog House with accessories like the Petmate Indigo Door and Petmate Indigo Pad, available for purchase separately.

Specifications 

Dimensions : 51.5 inch X 39.3 inch X 30 inch

Weight Range:90-125 Pounds

Product Weight 56.67 Pounds
feature_bullets: IGLOO DOG HOUSE: This heavy duty dog house for large dogs provides insulation in hot & cold weather, & an offset doorway that shields pets from rain. The roof has vents on the top of the house to circulate fresh air.

EXTRA LARGE DOG HOUSE: The raised floors & side moats of the outdoor pet house drains water & keeps pets dry. Features Microban Antimicrobial Protection to help prevent the growth of stain & odor-causing bacteria.
KENNELS & HOUSES: Crate & kennel training is vital for dog safety & comfort. We provide traditional travel carriers, wire training & exercise kennels, play pens, barn-style dog houses & more.

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!
